name: OR_LNLG_LITHO_TREAT_STG
description: This table contains information about treatment stages during lithotripsy.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TREATMENT_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the treatment stage for the lithotripsy procedure
